misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, hails from the esteemed Helsingin Golfklubi. Beyond the greens, Olli is known for his intimidating presence, and few dare to challenge him, owing to rumors of his wrestling skills. As a notable side venture, Olli also works as a professional model, showcasing a different facet of his multifaceted persona.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli's experience is undeniable. Though the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Olli remains an active and dedicated participant in the Hector events. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marks his eighth appearance, and he is undoubtedly aiming to make a significant impact.
